document.title: WEL_CHECK_BOX_3_STATE
document.paragraph:
A WEL_CHECK_BOX_3_STATE control can take three states, checked, indeterminate or unchecked.
2Appearance A WEL_CHECK_BOX_3_STATE
images/wel_check_box_3_state_unchecked.png wel_check_box_3_state_unchecked
A checked WEL_CHECK_BOX_3_STATE
images/wel_check_box_3_state_checked.png wel_check_box_3_state_checked
A indeterminate WEL_CHECK_BOX_3_STATE
images/wel_check_box_3_state_indeterminate.png wel_check_box_3_state_indeterminate
See also
/libraries/wel/content/controls/wel_check_box.html WEL_CHECK_BOX
